name: Level Info
description: Shows information about the level you are on!

issues.info: Having an issue with the mod?

text-width-offset.name: X-Axis Offset
text-width-offset.description: Modify the informational text's position horizontally

text-height-offset.name: Y-Axis Offset
text-height-offset.description: Modify the informational text's position vertically

text-size.name: Size
text-size.description: Scale the informational text's position up or down

text-opacity.name: Opacity
text-opacity.description: Make the informational text more or less transparent

number-separator.name: Number Separator
number-separator.description: Choose a separator for big numbers to be more readable

show-requested-stars.name: Requested Stars
show-requested-stars.description: Display the amount of stars/moons requested by the creator of a level

show-object-count.name: Objects
show-object-count.description: Display the amount of objects in a level (may be slightly inaccurate for levels with more than 65,535 objects)

show-ldm-object-count.name: Objects (LDM)
show-ldm-object-count.description: Display the amount of objects in a level with Low Detail Mode toggled on (may be slightly inaccurate)

show-two-player-mode.name: 2-Player Mode
show-two-player-mode.description: Indicate if a level is intended to be played by 2 players simultaneously

show-game-version.name: Game Version
show-game-version.description: Indicate the game version in which a level was created/updated

show-level-version.name: Level Version
show-level-version.description: Indicate the current version of a level

show-ldm-existence.name: Has LDM
show-ldm-existence.description: Indicate whether a Low Detail Mode exists or not for a level

show-sent.name: Sent
show-sent.description: Indicate whether a level has been sent by Moderators or not

show-level-id.name: Level ID
show-level-id.description: Display the ID of a level

show-original-level-id.name: Original ID
show-original-level-id.description: Display the ID of the original level (if it's been copied)

show-editor-time.name: Editor Time
show-editor-time.description: Show how much time the creator(s) of a level spent in the editor

show-editor-time-copies.name: Editor Time (with copies)
show-editor-time-copies.description: Show how much time the creator(s) of a level spent in the editor (includes previous copies)

show-attempts.name: Attempts
show-attempts.description: Show how many attempts you spent on a level

show-jumps.name: Jumps
show-jumps.description: Show how many times you jumped in a level

show-clicks.name: Clicks
show-clicks.description: Show how many times you clicked on your best attempt on a level

show-attempt-time.name: Best Time
show-attempt-time.description: Show the best time you did on a level
